website_summaries.verdict: A good, budget-friendly robot cleaner from ILIFE that offers basic cleaning features.
pros: Easy to schedule and run automatically
Can control the robot in real time with the included remote control
Self-charging features keep the vacuum powered
cons: Louder than other ILIFE robot options
Moves randomly, often covering the same location multiple times

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We got this on prime day so it’s still pretty new. It does a good job getting up pet hair and dirt/crumbs on our hard floors. Haven’t tried it on carpet yet. It goes for a LONG time before needing to recharge. The cats like to chase it, punch it, bat at the bristles, and ride it. It’s pretty funny! It’s still too new to give it 5 stars yet, so I’ll update after we’ve had it for awhile. Update: Had it for months and we still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P

customer_reviews.title: Will break very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Quit working after 2 vacuum sessions. It is a terrible knockoff of a Roomba and I seriously regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Dapore

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I am incredibly dispointed with this product. I receive it May 31st, and enjoyed it for not even a month and a half before it just stopped working. It turns on and runs for about 2 feet but then just stops working. It’s fully charged and cleaned but just decided it was done working. Don’t waste $150 on this product because you will be incredibly disappointed in a few months like me. I don’t know if here is a way I can fix it, but I really don’t want to have to buy a new vacuum. I wish I spent the extra money and went for the roomba brand name vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I WISH I'D DONE MORE RESEARCH!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this July 8, 2018. It worked pretty good for 2 months. Since then, it never works for long. It's constantly restarting as when it touches anything, it stops. I end up always using my regular vacuum. I keep thinking I can fix it, and I do for under 5 minutes. It's been a thorn in my side. I wanted to love it :(
customer_reviews.author: KATHY HALL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the Roomba, a cheap off-brand, The Shark iRobot, and now this model. This is by far the best of the 4! I'm so happy with this purchase! The suction is much stronger than the others, it moves faster, the collection bin is the largest of the 4, and it doesn't get stuck as much as the other 4. AND it's not that expensive!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BMessina

customer_reviews.title: 5 months & lid latch broken
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this vacuum for 5 months. It was working fine and then part of the latch that holds the lid down broke off. Now I cannot close the lid. This also means I cannot use the vacuum. I'm very disappointed as I use this every day - it does a decent job of picking up dog hair and dirt between my cleanings. Probably will not buy a new one if it only lasts this long.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Inoperable after less than 60 days
customer_reviews.text: I tried all troubleshooting suggestions to no avail, I highly recommend getting extended warranty because when I click on product support it says expired. I assumed at least 90 days so I thought I had more time to contact them about it: Delivered June 26th Return window closed on Jul 26, 2018 Product support window closed on Aug 25, 2018 When it was working, it was working great. It now starts, moves forward for a bit, then stops and sits there running in one place. Not even circling. Just sits there. No way to contact seller so I'm forced to leave a bad review, which I never had to do until now.
customer_reviews.author: C Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Does what is supposed to. I didnt pay for perfection, thus dont expect it. Higher models would have more refined scanning and correction. Fills up quickly, I dont know where it gets all that stuff.. Must be getting stuff I cant even see, thus its good!!
customer_reviews.author: photoj

customer_reviews.title: Not autonomous or effective
customer_reviews.text: Missed the deadline to return this thing by 1 week. It gets caught up in every loose wire on the floor. Observed it working on low pile carpet and it did not pick up even the smallest thread. If it goes over a furniture leg, it lifts itself up on 1 edge and then sits there helplessly. It's now hanging off the top step of our stairs because it didn't recognize the drop off and turn around, so this autonomous vacuum needs constant assistance. Someones getting paid to give this things good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this thing. It does a great job picking up dust. Pet hair gets trapped in the debris holder and it takes quite the effort to get it off. My biggest complaint and why the 2 stars, is that it doesn't pick up pieces of things. I've tested a range from small dog dog food, smarties candy, kitty litter, even a tiny small chocolate chip (the tiny ones). It either flings them around, or they go underneath the machine to eventually come out from under it. Total buyers remorse and I wish I could return it for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste A.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best purchase I’ve ever made! I have concrete floors and 2 shedding dogs... I used to have to sweep the floors every other day (which I didn’t). So I never wanted anyone to come into our house because I couldn’t keep up with the shedding. Got this bad boy and I hit the clean button every night before I go to bed and wake up to clean floors.... cleaner than when I would sweep. Im not exaggerating when I say that I have told everyone that has dogs to get one! I’ll set it to clean when the floors don’t seem dirty and when I clean out the filter it’s filled with dust and fur. Seriously amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Myers

customer_reviews.title: Works just as good as the more expensive machines like Roomba or Shark.
customer_reviews.text: This machine runs for over an hour on one charge and does a great job. It docks itself when the battery is low. The dirt cup holds a fair amount and is easy to empty. I have 2 small dogs and they shed constantly so I needed to run the vacuum daily if I want to keep up. I can program it to clean automatically but I just start it when I want. It goes over my tile floor with no problems and even does a good job on my many throw rugs. I didn’t think it would work on the bathroom matts but it was able to make the adjustment well. I would recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: theresa whitt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money. Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I had a roomba that finally died and was looking for a cheaper alternative. You definitely get what you pay for in this case. This thing was horrible for the entire 4 months it actually worked. No sensor to keep it from running over cords or anything else in its way. It vacuumed okay, but every 5 minutes you had to go untangle it from cords or whatever else it wasn’t intelligent enough to know not to run over. Also only worked for 4 months.... definitely do NOT waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Useless. Gets stuck 99% of the time.
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. I think that in 4 months of use, it’s completed the cleaning cycle less than 10 times. It gets stuck on EVERYTHING. Even the flattest rug trips it up. And tangle free?! Not a chance. The programming function stopped working after a few weeks so it has to be manually started. It’s so frustrating to watch the spinning brushes propel crumbs away from the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Raymon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit I have purchased. The first unit is still working, but after 2 years of rough use, it is just cosmetically beat up, and so new house, new vacuum. This vacuum works great for pet hair on tile and wood floors (Our dogs shed). I have installed feet on some furniture to ensure the furniture is tall enough for it to go under. Overall, this is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Works great but too loud and schedule isn't flexible.
customer_reviews.text: Likes ... the price is good; the robot is sleek and classy looking; it does a great job of cleaning; easy to use. Dislikes ... husband says it's too loud for him to take a conference call when it's vacuuming in another room. We wished the schedule was more customizable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for a while. Not great for cleaning hair from laminate flooring, but it did an okay job. However, it stopped working a few months back and I have since then tried to contact the customer service several times via email/their website, etc. I even sent them a video of the problem, but nothing. Should have just spent more and gotten a Roomba instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to myself back in January. It was dead and would not work by April. Called and emailed the company and got 0 response. Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ramos

customer_reviews.title: I would spend money on a better version
customer_reviews.text: I have such mixed feelings on this. It is the dumbest vacuum I have ever seen. I know that it is not the robot that follows a pattern but it just bounces aimlessly from wall to wall and will sometimes get stuck under nightstands because it just spins and spins! Its canister is quite small and so I have to empty it every day, which is sometimes hard to remember if you schedule a cleaning every day at a specific time. Ultimately, I wish I had spent more money on an intelligent one that had an emptying canister and I can block it out of specific rooms. Those are just my thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kauffmann

customer_reviews.title: These clean well and are awesome entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: First, the good and also bad... You have to keep the house cleaned up, maybe blocking some areas (charging station cord areas). They clean very effectively, but over time, which is fine. They have some patterns but it’s also very random. We like to throw dirt into the path and watch it disappear, it’s a game. My wife thinks they somehow create dirt. Can’t speak to auto home feature, the first one tried but got stuck up on a chair while on route a few times, I don't care. And we have purchased two of them so far, in the last week. Video is at 250% speed, they don’t fly around like that.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Turpin

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum was random in its approach to sweeping our wood and tile floors. Our home is primarily large wood floor areas in an open concept. The vacuum would go over some places several times but leave others completely untouched even when it was gently redirected. It did a good job going over large area rugs and a fair job of picking up dog hair. For us, it is easier, quicker and more efficient to either vacuum or Swiffer the hard floors ourselves. We were intrigued by the favorable price point on the vacuum; however, possibly a more expensive, higher quality robotic vacuum would work better
customer_reviews.author: Terry Cassady

customer_reviews.title: Dumb, but effective
customer_reviews.text: update: This died 2 weeks out of warranty. No more iLife products for me. This big galoot can't find it's home base. It's dust bin is far too small. It gets stuck in the most ridiculous places. It scares my dog. But I love it, and my house has never been cleaner. I set it off in the morning when the dog and I leave for the park to walk, and it is usually stuck somewhere by the time we get back, but with a full dust bin, so I'm happy. If we go outside for a while, I'll set it off again. I plan on working it to death.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rankin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum. I always run it in my kitchen, living room, and bedroom. It picks up a lot of dog hair and other debris on the floor. The only compliant is that it does not go over one of my area rugs. The rug must not be flat enough to the floor, so I use my Shark vacuum for that instead. I would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Ciarrocchi

customer_reviews.title: Warranty beware
customer_reviews.text: It was great for about 3 months. Had trouble with battery etc. amazon wanted me to go through manufacture warranty and manufacture wanted me to go through amazon. Came to a resolution that I would return device outside of return policy and receive a gift card for price of device. Returned device and received no such gift card. I wouldn’t buy it for 3 months later it to break and do the run around. Just throw the money out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I miss my Roomba
customer_reviews.text: I won't say it doesn't clean, it does. The bin fills with hair and dust/debris each time I run it. The bin is small so it fills fast, that may be the main reason I miss my Roomba. The suction power isn't great so it leaves a lot of lint from one carpet to the next. Also, I have long hair that gets wrapped around the brushes often. It's an easy fix, unscrew them take the hair off, put them back on but it's on a regular basis. Also, it will get stuck in weird areas for no real reason. I won't purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: NicBent

customer_reviews.title: Every Household Should Own One!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how we maintained the house clean without this device. I’m now a believer that every household should own one of these. Cleans up everything and it does it all by herself. Full charge last around 2 hours and it’ll go around the house several times. Best of all, she will charge herself and can be programmed to run at certain times throughout the day. She doesn’t fall of steps and she doesn’t run into any walls. Clean out her trash compartment every other day and that’s all you have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Javier & Annaliet

customer_reviews.title: Product worked great but only lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great but only lasted 2 months. One of the wheel motors then locked up. Nothing had gotten in the wheel that wouldve caused it to bind. Emailed seller months ago and never got a response back. Requested return or exchange of item. If seller ever gets back to me I will update rating. Mother in law has the same one that has working for over a year now without issues. I must have gotten the lemon.
customer_reviews.author: david m kurtzer

customer_reviews.title: Beast on hard floors!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is pretty amazing. We have 100% hard floors. It is a Beast on hardwood floors, tile and linoleum. We have area rugs (low profile) throughout our home (1,700sq ft) and this thing cleans them very well. It doesn’t have a rolling brush so for us that’s perfect! It fits under our low profile furniture. It has very strong suction and the best part is that it gets everything out of corners, and crevices! It did go in a bathroom and suck up hair which I wasn’t expecting it to do. But pleasant surprise. All in all, there’s no reason to spend $400-600 on a different brand with the same specs. Also it’s very quiet, and sleek
customer_reviews.author: D Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Great and even greater
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this vacuum it was worth every penny I have no regrets with this purchase. I’m so happy that I didn’t have to spend over $300 for this. This does everything that the more expensive ones do. Can be programmed too. So unique I can’t say enough good things about this device
customer_reviews.author: khalia Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product does a decent job of picking up most things but it does “throw” larger pieces around. We have a cat and it thows some litter around. It is loud unlike the description stating that it is quiet. The vacuum and tv can’t be ran at the same time. Also the latch receiver broke about 1 month after having it and after contacting customer service months ago, I still have no part to fix the latch so my lid stays up unless taped down. I was passed around through several people and was promised a part over 2 months ago. Disappointed in the product and especially customer service.
customer_reviews.author: serious shopper

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I like that it runs much quieter than a roomba. The holding tank is fairly small and for a house with lots of pet hair, that is disappointing, but we make sure we empty it every single time so it can suck up as much hair as possible each run. The battery lasts quite a while. Overall, pretty satisfied with it. Can't speak to the longevity of it yet but as far as functionality & savings when compared to the roomba, we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but kept getting stuck on things...
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted one of these but too expensive. When I saw this one on sale, we decided to try it. First, I really like the device and so wish it would work for us, but it didn’t. It kept getting stuck on different things in the apartment like the wood support base that our recliners are attached to. Got stuck, could get off. It also got trapped going in between our dining room chairs and couldn’t find a the way out. We tried it for three days, used the auto launch, all worked fine. It just kept getting stuck and we aren’t willing to leave it to run the house if that could happen. So sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Garrey H Stinson

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until it didnt......
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this product everything was working fine. The suction appeared to be working well. Maybe a week into having this contraption, it stopped working. It literally constantly paced and paced over the same spots, never picking up any dirt and or hair or anything. It literally REFUSED to do the edges of the walls anymore. Then one day I came home and it committed suicide. It literally just decided to tumble down the stairs. Plenty of times I watched it successfully go nowhere the stairs, but today it decided to end it all, i guess. Horrible replacement for a Irobot. Just go and spend the extra money itll be worh it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bummed.
customer_reviews.text: When it runs, it’s great. I feel like I’m constantly trouble shooting it though. If I could do it again, I wouldn’t have bought it. I have only used it 3 times. I’ve cleaned the sensors, checked the cleaning brushes, emptied the bin that holds the dirt, etc. I get the book out every time to trouble shoot it. It has a full charge and yet it still stops mid-job. I would love a refund to be honest. Bummed. I was super excited about this purchase and waited a long time before I splurged.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Ours failed after 2 months - can’t return.
customer_reviews.text: At first we loved it but after having it for 2 months the left wheel stopped working- making it just spin in place and then shut off. After insuring nothing was in there stuck and calling for support I was told it was too late to return. I was told that I would get a support call from the company and have yet to recieve it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hill

customer_reviews.title: Worked qell
customer_reviews.text: This worked pretty well for about a year. Shortly thereafter, it started banging into furniture like the sensor wasn't working. Next, it started running wonky- backwards for a few seconds then stalling out and beeping for no apparent reason. I opened the unit up and found that there was gobs of dust and dog hair all over the circuit board- the seal between the inlet and the dust bin apparently wasn't good. I cleaned the debris and closed the unit, it works again but is still banging into furniture. In all, if your looking for somthing temporary, this is a good option. Otherwise, pay the extra $100 and get a Roomba.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I never review products, but this one is so bad I have to share my thoughts/experience. SO with that being said - when this vacuum is on, it basically sounds like there is a small jet airplane driving around your house. Its extremely obnoxious, the dust pan is small, and its big and bulky. The remote controller is set up to self clean before everyone wakes up, but it still doesnt work. Not sure why. Moral of the story - DONT waste your money! Spend the few extra $$$ and get a Eufy or Deebot.
customer_reviews.author: Paolla Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Robot Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have named him, so I am obviously keeping him...Wall-E. He did try to fight with the fan twice...I separated the two of them, the fans cord was an issue. He also tried to eat a shoe...not the good ones so I wont hold it against him. Sucks up bugs and cleans on tile and door mats well. Doesnt really have a plan as it cleans...but as long as it gets stuff up I dont mind. I have super long hair and he does great with that. Overall very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a super sale. Very happy with the product for the price. Picks up tons of dust and hair that I don’t even notice! Easily goes underneath couches and furniture. We have two little dogs that don’t shed, so it’s not a heavy job. I no still pull out my big vacuum weekly for a good job on the carpets and baseboards, but this is great for a daily cleanup for crumbs and dust. I don’t feel the suction is strong enough or the brushes firm enough to really clean the carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Ward

customer_reviews.title: Hardy and reliable robot vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I've had my unit for 1 year and 3 months. Very happy with it, especially considering the low price when compared to Roomba brand vacuums. In the first month I had this, it jumped over a barrier I'd put upstairs and tumbled down about 20 stairs onto the hardwood floor. I thought it was going to be broken for sure, but nope. Just kept on going. The only thing that stops this guy is shoelaces. Gotta put up my shoes before I run it! Overall, a great purchase. I wish it worked with smartphones and smarthome hubs, but for $150 I'm not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pet Hair on Hardwood Floors
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats and two dogs and I used to have to sweep my floors every day. Now I just touch up the corners once a week. I love this vacuum, especially for the price! I set the timer so it vacuums while I am at work. Beware of cords. It will get tangled in them, so I have tacked up all the smaller cords in my house. It does fine with surge protector cords. Also, it doesn't do well on carpet. If you want a vacuum that does well on carpet, you will have to invest in something else, probably a lot more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mallo

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have a small house. 1,000 sq ft. And it helps me out a lot. Daily! Runs about 40 minutes or so then goes back home. Perfect for the size of my place
customer_reviews.author: Tina Espy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've had this about a month and a half. It already seems to have lost its power. I had it programmed to go off every night. It got stuck on things constantly. We'd wake up and it be in the middle of the floor or stuck to a rug. Now its stopped going off during the night and if I run it on it's own it lasts about 35 min and dies. Not worth it!!! And now I'm out of the window frame to return it.
customer_reviews.author: brewcrew121

customer_reviews.title: IT DIED QUICK!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Started out great but died after about a month....... Was really happy with it at first but obviously you would expect it to last longer. We have all hardwood and it was not in harsh conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Eric G

customer_reviews.title: Good but a bit noisy.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vaccum. It does a really good job on hardwood floors. I clean the bin every night and I’m amazed at the amount of dust and hair it picks up. I shed a lot of hair on a daily basis. I don’t even bother sweeping anymore, I just set this on at night when we go to bed and let it clean up the floors. The things I deducted points on: it’s a little louder than I’d like. I mean it’s lot like a normal stand up vaccum loud, but it’s a bit noisy. Also, it doesn’t pick up carpet too well so if you’ve got a lot of carpet, I would skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: Yang814

customer_reviews.title: Unit is very loud
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely loud... almost as if someone were going around my house with an actual vacuum cleaner. We had to turn it off while watching a movie. I’m not sure if this is common among other units. It does pick up debris but also tends to go over a lot of the same spots in the house and you end up having to pull the regular vacuum put to get the spots it’s missed. This also doesn’t work on the timers that I set and does not find the parent unit the charge like this states it does. I might return and spend a little extra for a better machine.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: The first couple of times I used this, it just kind of died in the middle of the room, not returning to its station like it was supposed to. Then after the third use, it just stopped working completely. I couldn't get it to leave the dock. The thing would just beep at me angrily. When I take it off the dock it does absolutely nothing. No lights. No sounds. Nothing. I'm having a replacement shipped. I'll follow up on this review if that one is any better.
customer_reviews.author: Kyky

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, getting daily use...
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price! We have 2 boys, 2 dogs and a cat, all living in a dusty desert, so this robot vacuum will be running daily. So far, it cleans our hard floors and rugs nicely. It avoids one small step-off into a separate living room, but gets stuck under beds on carpeted areas once in awhile. Wishing it had more room in the dust hopper, as it fills up quickly and needs to be emptied daily. Battery life is good and runs about 3 hours without quitting. Doesn’t always return home or find the base before shutdown...but for not having navigation capabilities, it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one and I love them
customer_reviews.text: I gave away my first one because I thought I was moving. When my situation changed I immediately ordered another one. These vacuums are awesome for the price. they do great in the corners they have great battery life for very large rooms although I prefer to segment the rooms out so that I can be sure that a whole room is done in a certain amount of time. I have a dog and it is critical for me to be able to vacuum while I am doing other things
customer_reviews.author: p808

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely dump machine
customer_reviews.text: I send the command "go home" - it goes to opposite direction. It looks like it has no floor plan in his memory. It always "try" every wall on full speed. Quite bad reaction on remote control direction. It looks like remote control based on IR and robot can't accept signals from an direction. Can't "see" low details on floor - always attack bowls of cat's food and water. Don't understand how to return it because I don't see "it doesn't work for me" at Amazon return form.
customer_reviews.author: sergei shalnov

customer_reviews.title: Good product, some flaws
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for my wife Christmas 2019. She fell in love with it. We have hardwood floors and it cleans well, but if it get caught in an area where there is furniture or other items, it gets confused. Goes in circles and cannot find its way out. Put it on timer during the day and it gets stuck, battery goes dead, and cannot find its way back to based. Experimented with the product and placed it close to the base and told it on the remote to go home. It had a hard time finding home. There are probably better programmed items out there.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin F. Long III

customer_reviews.title: Great entry-level robovac! Picks up dog hair well.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is fantastic for the price! Some of the other reviews made me nervous to order this vacuum, but I wanted an "entry-level" priced unit rather than investing $500. This one works even better than I hoped for! We have three shedding dogs and it does a fantastic job picking up their hair. Some might consider it an issue to have to empty the dust bin after every use, but I actually prefer it; if I only had to empty it every third use (for example), I would still have to open and check it every time and if I didn't, I would forget how recently I'd changed it. It's just easier to empty every time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy (JUNK)
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a pile of junk don’t waste your time. I had a roomba and I’m going back you get what you pay for! Doesn’t even have a brush like a vacuum does has 2 small whisper looking brushes that try to scoot stuff into the middle where there is a small 2 inch wide hole that lightly sucks air in. Doesn’t pick up anything
customer_reviews.author: tyler anderson

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned the 2nd time I used it!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on bare floors - picked up pet hair and crumbs with no problem. Not very effective on even very low pile carpet. I might have kept it for doing the bare floors, but it malfunctioned the 2nd time I tried to use it. It went into spot clean mode and just stayed there. Went through all the troubleshooting tips with no resolution. Had to return it as defective. Chose to just get a refund instead of replacement. Just not worth the money for the limited use.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Jean

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great for the first two weeks. Easy to clean. But now it gets stuck on everything and will run for about 5 minutes before trying to redock. I’ve tried everything. Cleaned it, out the dock out of sight. But it still remains to be a piece of junk. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Owens

customer_reviews.title: Why all the stars on Features and 1 overall?
customer_reviews.text: So While it worked I was pleasantly surprised and kind of shocked at how much dog hair etc was on the floor everyday. So the one-star is because after just a few months of light use (I travel a lot and did not leave it on when I was gone) it has stopped working right. It looks like things are fine but then after a minute or maybe 5 minutes it just stops. Now he is dead to me. Yes I named him. So one star only because zero stars is not possible.
customer_reviews.author: Nomore privacy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waist your money. Splurge and buy a real Roomba
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my parents for Christmas. I was confusing to set up and get to work. It took over a month for it to learn where to vacuum. Often it would just stay in one area and then get stuck. It never figured out how to find the recharging station. When it got full it would just continue to vacuum and spit the dust bunnies everywhere. Don’t recommend this one for people with dogs or animals that shed. Then about 2 months ago it just stopped working all together. Won’t turn on or charge. So disappointed. Biggest waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki G.

customer_reviews.title: My new BFF!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, and my husband even more so, but we are very happy with this little guy. I’ve named him Oscar, as he is Osome! We have a pug who sheds relentlessly, so we run Oscar every day, and every day the cup has some dirt but mostly...wait for it...pug hair! So we are pleased so far. Ran him three days in a row. Even snuck into a carpeted bedroom and seemed to be doing well in there too, but I sent him out to our hard floors. Goes over low pile floor mats very easily. Hope he lasts as he was very affordable! My new BFF (Best Fur Finder) for sure.
customer_reviews.author: The Magster

customer_reviews.title: Worst auto vac yet
customer_reviews.text: This was our 4th auto running vac and a true disappointment. This guy likes to fall over stairs, its not smart. The main filter and trash holding box has failed and broken and now the unit collects dust and debris and drops in piles. We wish we could return but it's been 6 months, a very short life for this type of device. The battery works fine. It is not easy to empty either.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Family

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service!  great product- works well with 3 dogs
customer_reviews.text: I like this little guy! works well, mine had the gearing lock up in 9 months, called the company, AWESOME lady helped me troubleshoot and sent a replacement, telling me to keep the old unit for parts! I would recommend this to anyone, and great service to back it up! we ran it daily, small-ish dustbin that had zero chance of keeping up with 3 German Sheppards, but it helped greatly, and beats dragging out the vacuum daily... just empty often and let it do it's thing!
customer_reviews.author: Richard M Joslin

customer_reviews.title: cute toy
customer_reviews.text: OK, I bought it on a whim since it was on sale. It did pick up cat hair on surfaces it covered. It did a fair job on thick carpet. The problem is that it goes in a random pattern & misses the same spots. I did move chairs & most obstacles out of the room. It was fun to watch & in about an hour covered most of the kitchen. It makes a fair amount of noise to make listening to music difficult. Fun to watch the cats reaction.
customer_reviews.author: countrygal

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: The description says it has sensors for "anti-fall" but we found ours had fallen from the second floor and broke into pieces! (Photo provided) Not only that, this vaccum is extremely loud and it doesnt have good suction. It has a hard time finding it's way back to the docking station to charge and over time stopped charging properly because the contact points didnt touch properly. We bought it in a "deal" but would highly encourage others to look for different models.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this appliance more than most relatives!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It doesn't hold a lot. But, if used everyday, it's just right for me. I have all hard floors, so I can't speak for how well it works on carpet. For the price I could not be happier. I have 2 short hair dogs and this wonderful little buddy keeps my floors free from dog hair tumbleweeds. I seriously love my little Winston more than 97% of people in my life. After a failed back surgery, using a regular vacuum requires 2 days of recovery. Winston has made my life easier & cleaner. I love you Winston!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: reggen

customer_reviews.title: Lasts less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: Edit* it is now November 15 and it no longer charges. Just sits at dock beeping. Cleaned brushes etc still no. It was good while it lasted. This thing is great! it doesnt slam into your baseboards like others I tried. It does hit the couch hard but I think thats because its off the ground and it cant sense the edges. It sucks wonderfully and it looks classy. Its also not loud at all, Spend the extra $50 and get this one instead. * almost returned it. It would start then stop and spin the brushes. Discovered that I had a ton of hair wrappes around the brushes. Took the screws off and cleaned and it worked normally again.
customer_reviews.author: Stikz

customer_reviews.title: Little loud but perfect for pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this vacuum! This vacuum goes under my couch, entertainment center and beds. I can’t believe how much dust and pet hair it collects! I have rugs in bedrooms upstairs and brought it up just to test it. My rugs aren’t high at all and it seemed to work fine. I may purchase another one for the upstairs. Definitely move smaller cords so it doesn’t get stuck on the vacuum. Little loud but I have it set to go off when I wake up and I just send it back home when I come downstairs. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: James Gerrior

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this vacuum at first but then after 1 month, the timer didn't work, fine, it was whatever. Then 1 year later, the vacuum doesn't even move. It turns on and maybe works for 5 minutes, then it shuts off even with a full charge. Dealing with warranty and all that is a hassle, just purchase a roomba.
customer_reviews.author: catmomlol

customer_reviews.title: You kinda get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Overall, not a bad vacuum. It does help with reducing the amount of time i would have had to vacuum myself but the suction power is not the best. It also gets stuck really easy (under the couch looks to be its favorite place so far). Definitely is not a deep cleaning substitute. The sensors are good so far but sometime it does mistake a a shoe/something small for a blockage and avoids go close to it while other times it goes full speed against a chair, so probably not the best sensors but not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: George B

customer_reviews.title: No tangly hung up roller bar
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to give 5 stars for deep cleaning because let’s face it... that isn’t what it’s for. However after owning 2 Roombas and the hassles with tangling in the roller bar and the side sweepers falling off and the noise, I am loving this little gem. I have 2 dogs. Sometimes 3 when granddog visits. This keeps me sane. She runs at night when we go to bed and everyone is accounted for. ( we learned this the HARD way after not one but Two poop incidents involving Roomba. OMG) Especially for the price I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Eggsolady

customer_reviews.title: not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing when I first got it. After about 6 months it had a few bumps: didn't start, didn't run long, etc. I figured out all of these by turning off and on or charging directly to the unit and bypassing the dock. Now, not even a year in I noticed it's not picking up anything, Just pushing dirt and dust around. I changed the filter, cleaned everything out and still no suction at all. Not worth it for $179 for a year.
customer_reviews.author: samme b

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife happy life!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has made my household so much happier! We have two dogs so their hair is always getting everywhere no matter how much you cleaned the next day it was a mess!!! We got this vacuum and have her setup to clean on schedule every day so we always come home to a clean house! It has no problem at all picking up dog hair and children mess! Setup is easy no need to do any boundaries or sensors just charge her up and let her go! She has become part of our family and we couldn't be happier!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect! It is easy to use! The base charge and the irobot is super easy to install. You do not need any tools to set up. It removed my hairs on the floor very well with the single run. Also, they gave you and extra brush to clean up. The vacuum suction is quite too. I always keep it running while I was working and I have no problem with the noises to interrupt me.
customer_reviews.author: Marry

customer_reviews.title: My robot!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a few days and used it twice. Can't believe how much it picks up! Yes it does seem to get stuck in some places, like under chairs, but it will find it's way out via trial and error. Definitely clean the filter and bin each time and recharge it each time, and be sure to give it the full charge before the first use. If any problems I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Five

customer_reviews.title: Our first robot vacuum and we love it.
customer_reviews.text: Our "Robbie" the robot gets the job done. Can't beat it for the price! It does look very random with it's pattern of cleaning yet gets the floors cleaned. We have had to help it find it's way home a few times but mostly, it gets there on it's own. It does get hung up on our back door jamb if we leave the door open and the screen closed. We love that we don't have to worry about it tumbling down the stairs. It is a little messy to clean the dust bin, but we don't mind since it is affordable. All in all, we love our Robbie!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality robot vac. Cheaper than a Rumba but equal the quality. Very trendy looking to.
customer_reviews.author: JDH

customer_reviews.title: Works great but doesn't avoid stairs
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Works well in an area with no wires or stairs. Gets stuck under furniture and occaisionally hangs up on a wire or dog toy. I run it every night and it does a great job of cleaning as long as I block off the places it likes to get stuck. I would give it 5 stars if it had virtual walls available to keep it away from trouble spots. I also have a Roomba which I use upstairs because it is much better about not falli g down the stairs or getting stuck under the dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Cantaffordit

customer_reviews.title: 6 Months later and I still love it.
customer_reviews.text: Have to admit, my expectations were low for this little thing and I was amazed the first week at how well it worked. It's been running every day for the last 6 months without a single issue. It still works just as good as day 1. I absolutely love this little guy, he gets up at 3am every morning and does his thing. Every Saturday I empty his filter and am amazed by the amount of crap he picks up in what I would consider an otherwise VERY clean house. Haven't even needed to change the filter or brushes yet. It's really been perfect. I'm buying another one just for my garage!
customer_reviews.author: Trial N' Error

customer_reviews.title: My everything
customer_reviews.text: I have deep loving feelings for my roobie (thats what i named her) i leave her on when i leave the house (make sure you clear floor of shoes, clutter, cat toys and other potential obstacles) and she cleans everything and when shes done she goes by herself to her charging station like the good girl she is:) I even changed my couch legs for 2 inch taller ones so she can get under it no problem. Get one you wont regret it! Make sure you empty the box each time and that she doesnt have hair accumulating in her little brooms, take care of her!
customer_reviews.author: Marina dc89

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog hair on hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.text: Our home is mainly dark hardwood floors, and we have a yellow lab whom seems to shed his entire coat daily. We purchased this vacuum to handle the hardwood floors, and it has not disappointed! We have area rugs here and there, and it seems to pick up the majority of things on the low pile carpet. We have to empty the bin once a day due to all of the dog hair, but we certainly don't mind doing that compared to dragging the old vacuum all across the house. This product does exactly what it is suppose to, and we couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: D. Remington

customer_reviews.title: Just does not have power....
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it moves around well, but meantime it doesn't pick up visible bits at all. At the end of its tour, I empty the basket of mostly blond hair and dust balls but I have to vacuum the carpet to pick up the visible bits.....would not buy again. Will go back to the Rhomba products.
customer_reviews.author: B. Storm

customer_reviews.title: works great, good value
customer_reviews.text: I'm not quite sure how i've survived all my life without a robotic vaccuum... Its pretty quiet and my cat isn't afraid of it at all, if anything he just likes to follow it around. I have wood floors and this thing gets under the furniture and all the pet hair that gets pushed up against the baseboards, also works pretty good at getting up the kitty litter that gets scattered. Also easily transitions over the area rugs that i have scattered. I can start the thing in the morning on my way out the door and when i get home it is resting patiently on the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B

customer_reviews.title: Great hardfloor vaccum
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum for 8 months now. It worked especially well It's first 6 months (I replace the new filter about once every two months). Recently it has been having some problems, not self docking, lesser suction, getting stuck in weird ways. I don't remember if it was every great on carpet, but now it doesn't really do anything for the carpet. For tile and hardwood floors it works great and the battery gives it a long life to cover the whole floor (ince it figures out how to leave the room). I wish i would have gotten one of these before! With two huskies this thing saves me so much time!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: I have had this vacuum for several years-still works well
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered stopped working and it was during the warranty period. They were very nice and prompt to help me exchange it for a new one. I have not put mine on a schedule because sometimes my dogs but their toys in the way. It has been working for almost 3 years now. I do order new filters on amazon and I try to replace the filter every month. It will not do as good of a job as you will with your vacuum but it is great to run every day (we have a dog that sheds) and it goes under the couch. I would recommend! The customer service was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective
customer_reviews.text: This is simple to set up and use. It does it's job sweeping and cleaning, especially under the couches which were cumbersome to move to vacuum under. Love running this unit when I exit out the door for work and come home with cleanly swept floors. The only drawback is that it is a little loud, but that is because it seems to have really good suction power. It moves from tile to low pile carpet to thicker carpet with ease, and all I really have to do is empty out the bin. I would recommend this unit for effective sweeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I am officially impressed enough to write a review. I have two large long haired dogs inside and I can tell a giant difference. It’s so nice to let it run during the day and not have dog hair everywhere. It runs for an hour or more than retirns to its home. My house is small, so it doesn’t take it long to cover everything. It makes its way from the kitchen, through the living room, down the hallway, and into the bedrooms. Hasn’t been stuck or had any problems yet. My house is all wood/tile/ and rugs. It travels over the rugs fine but can’t say how well it cleans carpet. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: ZERO customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The ILIFE vacuum does its function well enough, especially on human and pet hair. WHEN it runs, I like it. However, the automatic alarm function has never worked on my device. I reached out to the company on multiple occassions and literally received no word back. Closed telephone lines (during pandemic) but also no response to emails. My husband and I are both career oriented people so as much as I hear the "first world problem" nature of it, not having the automatic function basically negates the purpose of a robot vaccuum if you have to remember to turn it on every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mokibum13

customer_reviews.title: Awesome at Cleaning Up Dog Hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. I have 2 dogs and there is always so much hair. I run this vacuum every morning before I leave for work and it is incredible how much hair it picks up. It does a great job in getting in corners and picking up hair. I have had other robot vacuums that did not last long but I've had this one for several months and no sign of it slowing down and still working great. Some of the reviews mentioned that the vacuum had trouble getting back to its home but I have it located in a corner under a coffee table and it is always back where it started when I get home from work.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better one
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price point and it cleans well but the dislikes outweigh. This robot isn't very smart, it's patterns are off the wall and speratic, its sweepers tend to get bound up with hair easily, and the small container gets full very quickly and the only way you know it's full is following it around seeing it's not picking up anymore. When it's done it can't seem to find home sometimes. Glad to have a sweeper but I would recommend a better version
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive broom with holes in it
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an expensive broom that sweeps up almost 50% of the mess, this vacuum is for you! I bought this for hardwood floors two years ago but it did not pick up hardly any pet hair so I gifted it to my mother and bought a bobsweep (love that one btw). Since it didn’t pick up very much, and my mother was having to go behind and clean anyway, she has since regifted it to a local artists’ guild who still uses it to clean up clay shavings. They also go behind and finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won’t regret it!!
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is amazing. I got it because I have five pets, and a baby. My baby kept trying to eat things and pet hair off the floor. I was having to vacuum and dry mom multiple times per day, but now I don’t have to. I run the vacuum twice a day and I cannot believe the amount of crumbs, pet hair, litter, and dust it picks up! It’s very easy to clean and empty the canister and filters as well. 100% recommend! We have hardwood, vinyl, and a few rugs. It has no issues with any of the flooring. I want to get a second one for my basement!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for buck!
customer_reviews.text: Actually surprised at everything this thing can suck up. I have 2 sheddy dogs (German Shepard/ chow and a black lab) in a 900 sq ft apt and Tommy does a great job. Charge lasts about 1.5 hours and have had for a month. Only complaint is that I wish the “bag area” was bigger. But very thorough and gets the job done! Fun to watch when it tries to find its way back to charging port when battery low. Like a drunk person trying to stand up straight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this review so I could inform how long this lasts. I bought this just over a year ago and it has completely stopped working. First, the charging dock stopped charging the unit. There is a plug and charge option which prolonged the life for one more month. It’s a great vacuum but I would recommend a better brand as this doesn’t last very long. I contacted support who never replied to my message. I also spent additional money purchasing filters and additional brushes since these don’t last very long. All in all, spent about $180 for one year of use. Will be replacing with another brand vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected, dust free floors and being the first one to try out, didn't realize how much fun it is to watch it scout around our rooms and more, remote control a great feature too once you use it. It seems to find dirt and more stuff I didn't know I had inside. Clean the little trap every time, it will be full. I highly recommend this but it's not fond of shoe strings or old newspaper laying around. Just the fun trying to trick it is well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: franko8765

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Kinda disappointed, but it does clean. Just at a slow pace of bumping into stuff
customer_reviews.text: Slightly disappointed on me for not realizing it didnt automatically map its path as it traveled. But overall not bad. Good temporary product until you can afford the real deal. (Unless I'm missing something and theres an app for the machine to map its path so it stops bumping into walls and sofas everyday. If so, please, correct me.) On the plus side. Did an awesome job at COMPLETELY cleaning up my room after tearing up my flooring in prep to put down hardwood. So that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this vacuum!! I previously had an older model of this vacuum, but sadly after 2 years he needed to be replaced. I am so glad I stuck with this brand, because it did not disappoint! I have 2 cats, 1 dog, a toddler and a husband... All crumb producing lol this thing keeps my house looking and feeling clean and crumbless. It is pretty quite and I love that this newer version doesn't have a roller and you can empty it from the top! 10/10 highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Really, really does an excellent job!!
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked at how thorough this little robot is and how much I love it!! Yes, it is a bit noisy but like a white noise that isn't irritating. I'm learning to move things out of her way (dog food bowls) because she is so powerful she will push them around the house! I am also very surprised at how well it handles rugs. Great job! I definitely recommend this for anyone with hardwood, tile, marble, Persian type rugs, etc!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D.

customer_reviews.title: Works very good, had for a year now
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a year and it has worked very well. The area this vacum is used is tile and approximately 125 square feet and the battery life is plenty for cleaning this area. Also use it to clean the bathroom floor, it does good picking up all the long hair. Enjoy the auto clean schedule, it does the cleaning at night and wake up to clean floors everyday. Empty the container once a week, however if you have pets that shed you may need to empty more often. It goes over door mats and bathroom rugs well. If kitchen trash can is empty the vacuum will push it around some. Goes around chair and table legs good.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Set it and forget it
customer_reviews.text: I love how it cleans while I am gone, and the only thing I have to do is make sure socks are off the floor, and the dustbin is emptied before I leave for work. The first couple times, I ran it while I was around so I could empty the bin every 15 min. Even running every day, it is incredible how much dirt and dog hair it picks up. Every day. On low carpet, its about half as good as an upright vacuum cleaner. Still something, though, with no effort.
customer_reviews.author: CA mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Robovac - Company Stands behind their product!
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with the product until it just stopped working after 6 months. We ran it on our tile floors every night and it did a great job. We took good care of it and maintained it properly so not sure what happened. I realize these devices are not going to work for years but I expected at least a year or two. Going to contact the company and report back. Update: contacted company and after running a test, they sent me a new unit. VERY HAPPY with the customer service!! Buy with confidence. These guys stand behind their product. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Low Spark

customer_reviews.title: Works well but leaves marks on our floors.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and the customer service is great, only reason not rated higher is leaving wheel marks on laminate floors. I have Allen and Roth laminate floors and the wheels are leaving marks on the floor I can not get up, even tried a magic eraser. The unit does a great, great job on cleaning and we had an issue with the unit not homing and the company sent us a new one. If anyone has an idea to remove the wheel marks please let us know.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Battery is poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vacuum for exactly 6 months. Now it won’t hold a charge. So expect your battery to only last until the warranty is up. Trying to find a replacement battery is a pain. Ali Express has one and they are $35. If I am going to have to spend that much every 6 months I might as well get a better quality vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Peldyn

product_meta.title: ILIFE V3s Pro Robot Vacuum Cleaner, Tangle-free Suction , Slim, Automatic Self-Charging Robotic Vacuum Cleaner, Daily Schedule Cleaning, Ideal For Pet Hair，Hard Floor and Low Pile Carpet
product_meta.description: Robot Vacuum Cleaner ILIFE V3S Pro ideal suction machine for Pet Hair Anti-olision and Auto-Load Characteristics: Specification 100 ~ 240V, 50 / 60Hz, works in most countries. 2 Charging mode: Automatic / Manual (Tips: when charging the switch on the body must be ON) 3 Cliff sensors in the bottom that make Robot Vacuum cleaner avoid falling (> = 6 cm in height). 4 Cleaning Mode: Automatic Mode, Point Mode, Edge Mode, Programming Mode. 300 ml dust bucket with more capacity. Nano-fibers Cloth is available for deeper cleaning. Suction Capacity: 600 Pa range Climbing Capacity: the maximum grade of 15mm. 80-150 square meters of automatic cleaning for home and large office Durable battery: 2600 mAh Li-battery lasts long hours of work Low Noise: lower <55dB Remote control with LCD screen serves for easy operation. LED indicators on the product showing the work status. Cleaning schedule: set the start time, and do the cleaning every day at the set time is still not at home or office. Auto Charge: This Robotic Vacuum Cleaner can return to the charging base when it is out of power. 8 cm thickness to clean any the floor that is under the furniture. Double protection for shocks: 1. OBS sensors on the body to recognize the barrier and avoid being hit. 2. In case the body touches the barrier, the Damping structure and the TPU bumper in the front to protect the filter and the furniture.
feature_bullets: With a tangle-free pet hair care technology, focuses on picking up hairs, dirt, debris on hard floors
Low profile design to clean under beds, furniture where dirt hides. Ideal for hardwood, tile, laminate or stone.
Self-charging, programmable schedule, smart sensors for anti-bump and anti-fall. Runtime 90-100 mins
Easy operation with remote control, or one touch auto clean button on robot.
Tip: Easy maintenance, empty dustbin and clean the filter after each use. Replace filter every month.
A 12-month and U. S. customer service team provides you with peace of mind and great service

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars6,495 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Robot vacuum x1,User manual x1,remote control x1,extra hepa filter x2,extra sides brush x2,cleaning brush x1,AC adapter x1, Charging dock x1
